translation-contributors: 貢獻者: Timtower, Netherfoam, KaiNoMood, Mgazul, JackTheChicken 和 Andre_601
translation-country: 語言: &b&l繁體中文 Chinese Traditional (zh_TW)
not-looking-at-shop: &c無法找到儲物箱商店。您需要注視著儲物箱。
integrations-check-failed-create: &c集成模組 {0} 拒絕了創建商店操作。
integrations-check-failed-trade: &c集成模組 {0} 拒絕了商店交易操作。
3rd-plugin-build-check-failed: &c第三方插件 &l{0}&r&c 拒絕了權限檢查操作，您有權限建立商店嗎？
no-creative-break: &c你不能在創造模式破壞其他玩家的商店，請使用生存模式或使用超級工具 {0} 來破壞。
trading-in-creative-mode-is-disabled: &c你不能在創造模式下使用商店交易。
supertool-is-disabled: &c超級工具已經被關閉，現在已經不能使用超級工具破壞任何商店。
no-double-chests: &c你沒有權限創建大型儲物箱商店。
not-managed-shop: &c你不是該商店的擁有者或幫手。
you-cant-afford-a-new-shop: &c需要花費 {0} 元才能創建商店!
player-bought-from-your-store-tax: &c{0} 從您的商店購買了 {1} 個 {2}，同時你被收取 {3} 元的稅金。
you-cant-afford-to-change-price: &c您需要花費 {0} 元來更改商品價格。
shops-arent-locked: &c請記住，商店不受盜竊保護！ 如果要防止盜賊，請用LWC，Lockette等將其上鎖！
you-cant-afford-to-buy: &c商品價格是 {0} 元，但是你只有 {1} 元。
negative-amount: &c我的天啊，沒想到居然有人想要交易負數的數量。
not-a-number: &c輸入內容只能是數字，但你輸入了 {0}。
not-a-integer: &c輸入一定是數字，但你輸入了 {0}。
player-bought-from-your-store: &c{0} 從你的商店買了 {1} 個 {2}。
shop-out-of-stock: &5你在 {0}，{1}，{2} 販賣 {3} 的商店已經售罄一空。
shop-has-no-space: &c這個商店只能再收購 {0} 個 {1} 而已!
the-owner-cant-afford-to-buy-from-you: &c這個商店只能再收購 {0} 個 {1}。
player-sold-to-your-store: &a{0} 在你的商店賣出了 {1} 個 {2} 。
fee-charged-for-price-change: &a你付了 &c{0}&a 元以更改商店價格。
price-is-now: &a現在你商店的定價是 &e{0} 元。
average-price-nearby: &a附近商店的平均價格為: &e{0} 元。
shop-has-changed: &c你嘗試交易的商店在你點擊後已經有變動！
nearby-shop-this-way: &a這個商店離您有 {0} 格的距離。
no-nearby-shop: &a這個商店離你有 {0} 格的距離。
buying-more-than-selling: &c警告: 你的收購物品比販賣物品多。
not-enough-space: &c您只剩下 {0} 格空間可以裝東西！
owner-bypass-check: &e略過了所有檢查，交易成功。(你是商店店主)。
reached-maximum-can-create: &c你創建的商店數量 {0}/{1} 達到上限！
restricted-prices: &c{0} 元是無效的價格：最高 {1} 元，最低 {2} 元。
no-enough-money-to-keep-shops: &c你的錢不夠繳稅，所以你的所有商店已經被刪除...
break-shop-use-supertool: &e您可以使用超級工具破壞商店。
failed-to-put-sign: &cNot enough space around the shop to place the info sign.
failed-to-paste: &cFailed to upload the data to Pastebin. Check your internet connection and try again. (See console for details)
warn-to-paste: &eCollecting data and uploading it to Pastebin, this may take a while. &c&lWarning:&c The data is kept public for one week! It may leak your server configuration and other sensitive information. Make sure you only send it to &ltrusted staff/developers.
price-too-high: &cThe shop price is too high! You cannot create one with a price higher than {0}.
you-cant-create-shop-in-there: &c您沒有在這個地方創建商店的權限。
unknown-player: &cTarget player doesn't exist, please check the username you typed.
shop-staff-cleared: &aSuccessfully removed all staff members from your shop.
shop-staff-added: &aSuccessfully added {0} as a staff member for your shop.
shop-staff-deleted: &aSuccessfully removed {0} as a staff member for your shop.
success-change-owner-to-server: &aSuccessfully set the shop owner to Server.
purchase-failed: &cPurchase failed: Internal Error. Please contact the Server Administrator.
no-pending-action: &cYou do not have any pending actions

menu.sell-tax-self: &aYou didn't pay taxes because you own this shop.
menu.this-shop-is-buying: &a此商店是 &d收購物品&a 的商店。
menu.this-shop-is-selling: &a此商店是 &b賣出物品&a 的商店。

how-many-buy: &aEnter in chat, how many you wish to &bBUY&a. You can buy &e{0}&a. Enter &ball&a to buy them all.
how-many-sell: &aEnter in chat, how much you wish to &dSELL&a. You have &e{0}&a available. Enter &ball&a in chat, to sell all.
blacklisted-item: &cYou cannot sell this item because it is on the blacklist
how-much-to-trade-for: &aEnter in chat, how much you wish to trade &e{1}x {0}&a for.

toggle-unlimited.unlimited: &a這個商店現在已經沒有數量限制。
toggle-unlimited.limited: &a這個商店現在已經恢復數量限制。

command.invalid-bulk-amount: &cThe given value {0} is larger than max stack size or lower than one
command.no-trade-item: &aPlease hold a trade item to change in main hand
command.wrong-args: &cInvalid arguments. Use &l/qs help &rto preview the list of commands.

description.title: &aQuickShop help
description.price: &eChanges the buy/sell price of a shop
description.find: &e找到距離您最近的買賣特定商品的商店
description.refill: &e將一定數量的商品加到商店
description.create: &eCreates a new shop from the targeted chest
description.amount: &eTo set item amount (Useful when having chat issues)
description.size: &eChange per bulk amount of a shop
description.supercreate: &eCreate a shop while bypassing all protection checks
description.removeall: &eRemove ALL shops of a specified player

controlpanel.unlimited-hover: &e點擊切換商店買賣無上限模式。
controlpanel.mode-selling-hover: &eClick to change the shop to BUY mode.
controlpanel.mode-buying-hover: &eClick to change the shop to SELL mode.
controlpanel.price-hover: &eClick to set a new price for the item.
controlpanel.stack-hover: &eClick to set the amount of item per bulk. Set to 1 for normal behaviour.

list: {0} was released. You are still using {1}!
Surprise! {0} came out. You are on {1}
Looks like you need to update. {0} was released!
Ooops! {0} was now released. You are on {1}!
I swear, QS has been updated to {0}. Why have you not updated yet?
Fixing and re... Sorry, but {0} was released!
Err! Nope. This is not an error. {0} has been released!
我的天啊! {0} 已經出來了! 您怎麼還在使用 {1}？
今日新聞: QuickShop 已經釋出 {0} 的更新!
Plugin k.i.a. You should update to {0}!
There is an update available Commander. {0} has just came out!
Look my style---{0} updated. You're still using {1}
啊啊啊! 是新的版本 {0}! 快更新!
What do you think? {0} has been released! Update!
Doctor, QuickShop has a new update {0}! You should update~
Ko~ko~da~yo~ QuickShop has a new update {0} ~
updatenotify.remote-disable-warning: &cThis version of QuickShop has been marked as disabled by the remote server. That means that this version may have serious issues. Receive details from our SpigotMC page: {0}. This warning will appear and spam your console until you switch to a not disabled version. This won't affect your server, however.

shop-removed-cause-ongoing-fee: &cYour shop at {0} was removed because you didn't have enough money to keep it!
digits-reach-the-limit: &cYou have reached the limits of decimals in the price.
shops-recovering: 正在嘗試從備份檔案中還原所有商店...
backup-failed: Cannot backup the database. Check the console for details.
translate-not-completed-yet-click: {0} 的翻譯完成度為 {1}，您想幫助我們改進翻譯嗎？點擊這裡！
translate-not-completed-yet-url: {0} 的翻譯完成度為 {1}，您想幫助我們改進翻譯嗎？前往Crowdin：{2}
shop-now-freezed: &a你已經凍結了商店。現在沒有人可以與這家商店交易！
shop-nolonger-freezed: &a您解凍了該商店。現在恢復正常！
shop-cannot-trade-when-freezing: &c您不能與這家商店交易，因為它已經被凍結。
shop-freezed-at-location: &e您的商店 {0} 在 {1} 被凍結！
denied-put-in-item: &c您不能將此物品放入您的商店！
how-many-buy-stack: &a在聊天室中輸入你想 &b買&a 的數量。每份中有 &e{0}&a 個該物品，你目前可以買 &e{1}&a 份。輸入 &ball&a 以買下所有該物品。
how-many-sell-stack: &a在聊天室中輸入你想 &d賣&a 的數量。每份中有 &e{0}&a 個該物品，你目前擁有 &e{1}&a 份這樣的物品可賣出.。輸入 &ball&a 以賣出所有該物品。
